channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘We live modestly’: My wife and I have $900K in stocks and $380K in savings and CDs. Are we holding too much cash?
item.description: “My investment adviser says we have too much invested in cash instruments.”

item.title: My second wife says her 2 kids should inherit our estate, but I also have 2 kids. Is that fair?
item.description: “I will leave the $1 million inheritance I received from my parents to my biological daughters.”

item.title: Global growth bellwethers Maersk and Toyota lower guidance on tariff impact
item.description: Danish shipping and logistics giant A.P. Moeller-Maersk and Japanese auto giant Toyota each sounded the alarm on tariffs on Thursday as both lowered t...

item.title: Suze Orman says retirees should have a 5-year ‘just-in-case’ fund. Is this true?
item.description: “I had people coming unglued on me when I suggested retirees should have three to five years of savings.”

item.title: All about the Connecticut home where singer Michael Bolton has been recovering from brain cancer
item.description: Michael Bolton has opened up about the ways he relied on his family at his Connecticut residence during his aggressive brain cancer treatment.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
